title: Wool Fashion Award
creator_credit: Frank Land and Australian Wool Corporation
brief_description: Against a background of beauty spots in Sydney, models display the winning styles in frocks, sportswear and costumes of the first fashion awards presented in Australia in 1956. Credits include: fashion adviser Pat Woodley; accessories by David Jones Ltd; photographed by George Heath; compered by Bob Pollard and edited by Sydney Whiteley.
